snippet: Gov. Rick Perry told federal officials on Monday that Texas would not expand Medicaid or create an insurance exchange.
abstract: Gov Rick Perry of Texas tells federal officials that the state has no intention of expanding Medicaid or establishing a health insurance exchange, two major provisions of the health care reform law.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry told federal officials on Monday that Texas would not expand Medicaid or create an insurance exchange.

headline.seo: Perry Says Texas Rejects Health Law ‘Intrusions’
headline.main: Perry Declares Texas’ Rejection of Health Care Law ‘Intrusions’
headline.print_headline: Perry Declares Texas’ Rejection of Health Care Law ‘Intrusions’

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
